events.title: Unison Computing company founding
events.description: The Unison triumvirate unites! Paul, RÃºnar, and Arya found a public benefit corporation in Boston.

events.title: First alpha release of Unison
events.description: Unison calls for alpha testers for the first official release of the Unison language.

events.title: Strangeloop conference
events.description: The tech world gets an intro to Unison at the storied Strangeloop conference.

events.title: Unison adopts Sqlite for local codebases
events.description: Switched from git-style, filesystem-based database to new Sqlite format for 100x codebase size reduction.

events.title: Unison Share's first deployment
events.description: Unison's code hosting platform released. People start pushing and pulling code from their remote codebases.

events.title: Unison Forall conference
events.description: Our first community conference is an online affair featuring topics from CRDTs to the Cloud.

events.title: LSP support
events.description: The first appearance of the red-squiggly line for Unison appears in text editors.

events.title: Projects land in Unison
events.description: We added the ability to segment your codebase into discrete projects, with branches for different work-streams.

events.title: Kind-checking lands for Unison
events.description: Since their introduction, Unison's exhaustiveness and kind-checking features have prevented us from many headaches.

events.title: Contributions added to Unison Share
events.description: We added the ability to make pull-requests to Unison Share. Unison OSS maintainers rejoice.

events.title: OrderedTable storage added to the Cloud
events.description: `OrderedTable` is a typed transactional storage API on the Cloud. It's built atop other storage primitives; proving that storage can be compositional.

events.title: Unison Cloud generally available to the public
events.description: After much alpha testing, we release the Unison Cloud to the general public! Folks deploy hello-world in a few commands.

events.title: We open-source Unison Share
events.description: ðŸ«¶ Unison Share belongs to us all.

events.title: Cloud daemons
events.description: Long-running services (daemons) were added as a new Cloud feature.

events.title: Ecosystem-wide type-based search
events.description: Discover projects, terms, and types across the entire ecosystem in a few keystrokes.

events.title: Unison Desktop App
events.description: Unison Desktop offers visibility into your codebase structure with a rich, interactive UI.

events.title: Volturno distributed stream processing library
events.description: We ship a high scale streaming framework with exactly-once processing and seamless, pain-free ops. Users write distributed stream transformations in an easy, declarative API.

events.title: Runtime performance optimizations
events.description: The UCM compiler team delivers on an extended effort of improving Unison's runtime.

events.title: MCP server for Unison
events.description: Our MCP server supports AI coding agents in typechecking code, browsing docs, and inspecting dependencies.

events.title: Cloud BYOC
events.description: We launched Unison Cloud BYOC - Unison Cloud can run on your own infrastructure anywhere you can launch containers.

events.title: UCM git-style diff tool support
events.description: We added a git-style code diff integration. View PRs and merges in a familiar format.

events.title: Branch history comments
events.description: Annotate your branch history with helpful descriptions for yourself or collaborators.
